<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Kimilekki](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2138)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Demon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=42" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 17</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet, [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +34, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +28, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +2

**Con** +9

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +8
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 40 

**Fort** +32 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +30 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

**HP** 380

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 15, good 15

**Truth Vulnerability** A glabrezu's lies sustain them, and the truth can destroy them. Whenever a [revelation](/Traits.aspx?ID=138) effect counteracts or reveals the glabrezu's illusions or the glabrezu fails a save against an effect that would prevent them from lying (such as [_zone of truth_](/Spells.aspx?ID=379)), the demon takes 5d6 mental damage. They take this damage only once per effect, even if the effect reveals multiple illusions or prevents multiple lies.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pincer +33 ([deadly 3d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+14 bludgeoning plus 2d6 evil and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d6+14 slashing plus 2d6 evil

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +33 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+14 piercing plus 2d6 evil

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 38, attack +30
- **Cantrips (9th)**
[Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **2nd**
[Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) (at will)
- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48) (at will), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)
- **7th**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will), [Reverse Gravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=261)
- **8th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (at will), [Spiritual Epidemic](/Spells.aspx?ID=304)
- **9th**
[Wail of the Banshee](/Spells.aspx?ID=361)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)
- **Constant (6th)**
[True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Divine Rituals** DC 38

- **1st**
[Abyssal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=21)

**Captive Rake** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** A creature is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) in the glabrezu's pincer; **Effect** The glabrezu pulls the grabbed creature up to 5 feet closer, then makes two claw Strikes against it. Those Strikes count as one attack when determining the glabrezu's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both Strikes.

**Steady Spellcasting**   When a reaction would disrupt the glabrezu's spell, the demon can attempt a DC 15 flat check, avoiding the disruption on a success.

**Sudden Betrayal**   A glabrezu can always use [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) when rolling initiative as long as they're aware of at least one opponent before initiative is rolled. When using Deception for initiative, the demon gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception.

**Treacherous Veil**   A glabrezu's [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) enables it to appear as a creature of any size.

**Twisted Desires**  ([Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) Once per month, a glabrezu can grant a mortal humanoid the effects of a [_miracle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=196) spell granted by an Abyssal patron, though the glabrezu always perverts the _miracle_ according to their own treacherous nature.

</column>
